patterns: I want to get informations about the event.
give me informations about the event?

responses: Industry Application Society Tunisia Annual Meeting 3.0 is annual meeting organized in its 3thd edition by IEEE IAS ENETCOM student branch chapter. This year theme is the application of computer vision in the industry
IAS Tunisia Annual Meeting 3.0 is organized by IEEE IAS ENETCOM SBC. It will be about Computer vision in industry 4.0
